column2:
"Bouncer!
Please show your support for Bouncer!
Hey, you too Io, get your act together!"
"S-support Bravers .. too!"

"Don't be seduced by Summoner's allure!
You too, Io!"

"I don't think the issue is being a
Summoner however..."
"Io, please, this is serious!"

"Well, even if you ask me to take it
seriously ... rather, why are you using
the exact advertisement strategy
Azanami used?"

"If Summoners are using the appeal of
their pets, then that means, we the class
representatives, must use our own looks and
charms to win their hearts!"

"Those pets are used by Summoners as cheap
tactics to lure people, such as <%me>...
It's unforgivable!"

"I'm pretty sure that's just
in your head."

"Ah, <%me>.
I apologize for Katori's antics."

"Out of nowhere, there was a request from
Katori herself, to promote Bouncer.
And when I decided to see for myself,
well... it speaks for itself."
"1. You sure it's ok?"
"2. What are they doing?"

"It's not an issue.
Once they realize how pointless it is,
I'm sure they'll give up."
"Promoting Bouncer. I've heard that Azanami did the same thing."

"The thought of \"Summoners are unfair;
I don't want to lose to them\", honestly
doesn't make much sense."

"Though, Katori is trying her best to
spread the word of Bouncer. That alone
deserves praise."

"Rather than to jump straight into the
action--it's better to have ambition,
regardless of the idea behind it.
In this way, the training has its merit."

"However, I do feel sorry for Io, who
was dragged into Katori's schemes..."

"I suppose all she can do is give
up and say that she was caught
up in the moment."

"Bouncer! Bouncer!
Bouncers are better than Summoners!
Please give your support to Bouncer!"
"Uh, B-braver... support Bravers too..."

"Quickly, Io!
Next up is the Gate Area!"
"Please give me a break..."
